overview: Twenty-five of the world's best riders take on Jindabyne, Australia's answer to freeride madness. Featuring 25-foot drops, north shore ramps, steep rocky chutes, and deadly snakes, it's a course to be approached with caution! Andrew Mills, Wade Simmons, Robbie Bourdon, John Waddell, Tarek Rasouli and others hammer on trails others would go near. Enjoy the ride!
title: Jindabyne 2002: White Knuckle Extreme
